nodes.text: Dr'aan was a Sullustan clone. He was discovered at an abandoned Alliance base in 0 ABY, by Tash Arranda and Shi'ido Mammon Hoole. Dr'aan appeared to be an exact double of the Rebel naturalist Dr'uun Unnh. It was later discovered that Dr'aan was a clone produced by the Empire, using an experimental, yet sophisticated, cloning technique.
